Subject: Certificate hostname mismatch
Description: Hello Support Team, I got two pop-ups which indicates a connection drop because of a certificate hostname mismatch. I could find the errors in the eppclient.log. What does this error mean? If it is related with DPI Bypass, i can see a DPI bypass event for play.google.com but not for bam.eu01.nr-data.net Thanks, -serhat
What_We_Know__c: Because of DPI the customer could see a connection drop because of a certificate hostname mismatch.
Next_Steps__c:
The collected logs did not capture the event and the issue. 
The customer should collect a new set of logs if the issue happens again.
